casebody.data:
The STANDING JOINT LEGISLATIVE COMMITTEE ON REAPPORTIONMENT OF the MISSISSIPPI LEGISLATURE, appellant,
v.
MISSISSIPPI STATE CONFERENCE OF the NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF COLORED PEOPLE, et al. No. 12-1132. Supreme Court of the United States May 20, 2013. On Appeal from the United States District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi. Judgment Affirmed.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
